member.name: M:WIFI.ToolLibrary.ConsoleIO.ConsoleTools.DisplayMesssage(System.String)
member.param: The message that will be displayed

member.name: M:WIFI.ToolLibrary.ConsoleIO.ConsoleTools.DisplayMesssage(System.String,System.ConsoleColor)
member.summary: Displays a given message with a given System.ConsoleColor
member.param: The message that will be displayed
The System.ConsoleColor that will be used

member.name: M:WIFI.ToolLibrary.ConsoleIO.ConsoleTools.GetInt(System.String)
member.summary: Reads a System.Int32 value from the console
member.param: Prompt the user will see before the input

member.name: M:WIFI.ToolLibrary.ConsoleIO.ConsoleTools.GetDouble(System.String)
member.summary: Reads a System.Double value from the console
member.param: Prompt the user will see before the input

member.name: M:WIFI.ToolLibrary.ConsoleIO.ConsoleTools.GetString(System.String)
member.summary: Reads a System.String from the console
member.param: Prompt the user will see before the input

member.name: M:WIFI.ToolLibrary.ConsoleIO.ConsoleTools.GetBool(System.String)
member.summary: Reads a System.Boolean from the console
member.param: Prompt the user will see before the input

member.name: M:WIFI.ToolLibrary.ConsoleIO.ConsoleTools.GetDateTime(System.String)
member.summary: Reads a System.DateTime object value from the console. Input format: [dd.MM.yyyy hh:mm:ss]
member.param: Prompt the user will see before the input
member.returns: The System.DateTime object that was read

member.name: M:WIFI.ToolLibrary.ConsoleIO.ConsoleTools.GetDateTime(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Reads a System.DateTime object value with a specified format from the console
member.param: Prompt the user will see before the input
The format in which the DateTime is read (example: [dd.MM.yyyy hh:mm:ss])
member.returns: The System.DateTime object that was read

member.name: M:WIFI.ToolLibrary.ConsoleIO.ConsoleTools.StringIsInteger(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if an input is a number or not. The number has to be > 0
member.param: the input that will be checked
member.returns: true: input was a number false: input was not a number

member.name: M:WIFI.ToolLibrary.ConsoleIO.ConsoleTools.StringIsDouble(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if an input is a double or not. The number has to be > 0
member.param: the input that will be checked
member.returns: true: input was a double false: input was not a double
